Man I miss Overwatch 1

Don't you guys have BattleNet ? (Or blizzardapp whatever this shit called..)
Here, a list of everything Team Fortress 2 , thats killing OW2..
FIRST OF ALL : - TF2 outlived Overwatch, Twice. Without any major update or new weapons in 6 years... (Chad)
- TF1 turned into TF2, but it was a different game, New maps, graphics, heroes, stuff etc.. not just added a number for fun. (Ouch.)
- TF2 is better to play, and community is awesome.
- TF2 Sentry isnt broken, and aim better.
- TF2 Had multiple guns you can use between other Mercenaries.
- TF2 has a unlimited access of build & equipement, that you dont have to pay for (Like OW2 pay the champ or tryhard..)
- TF2 have MvMachines ticket tour. You can win a lot of money and sexy weapons with this.
- TF2 was on steam before.
- TF2 Crates can be openned with key for 2.20$ , cost less than those 20$ for a single skin in OW2.
- Crate can also drop content that cost a lot of money (Unusuals)
- TF2 have a lot of community maps.
- TF2 have community servers.
- TF2 Give you items for free , for achievement or just playing.
- TF2 Dont need new heroes, cause weapon build is fire.
- TF2 Player sometimes roleplay as their role characters. Funny asf.
- TF2 has ROCKETJUMP.
- TF2 is made by Valve. Praise. Lord. Gaben.
- TF2 is getting a Source 2 Remaster by community.
- TF2 planned a PvE event, Turned the game free 2 play , and gave us extremly fun moment on it, and still playing this atm.
- TF2 is Team Fortress 2
- TF2 has a lot of reference in it (New map in VSH had Fnaf, some cosmetics have batman etc..)
- TF2 Is easier and faster to install, Less Gbytes.
- TF2 Have cheaters like OW2, But TF2 community are kicking them all the time (Amazing love y'all).
- TF2 Have a real Team Comp' to push or defend. If you loose, its because you are bad, and not cause you'r hero wasnt OP vs someone else..
- TF2 have a Workshop.
- TF2 have Kazotscky kick.
- TF2 Have better taunt et can moove, and taunt with anybody, without making them pay the taunt.
- TF2 Will have this list improved over days , cause TF2 is just better in everything than OW2.

Feel free to tell me why TF2 is better, i'll had you'r comment in my review, Thanks, Long Live Team Fortress 2

Appreciate the Steam release and the native Steam integration - no Battle.net launcher is not needed to play. Even the Steam friends are natively integrated in the game and there are achievements (compared to e.g. Ubisoft's recent published games). While Blizzard is doing quite some crap recently (shop pricing, removed PvE modes, etc), it's unfortunately still fun with friends.

They released Overwatch 2 as a free to play business model, which leans more heavily into microtransactions, overpriced skins and predatory behaviour. To make matters worse, they shut down the first game, making it unplayable for people who purchased it, meaning the playerbase has to move over to this free to play business model to keep playing a game.

But at least it will have a promised PvE Hero mode that would feature character progression, which was a main part of the game’s selling point? no, that was cancelled. but you can buy a lighter story mission for "only" $15

Don't support this predatory behiavor.

Pros:  
-Best free 2 play game in terms of smoothness, premium feeling and overall polish.
-Amazing artstyle.
-Good variety of diverse characters that gives everyone a chance. Even a grandma on hear dying breath can take Junkrat or Mercy and contribute. 

Cons:
- A Blizzard game.
-Lost its soul over the past few years
- Some characters are poster characters of the game and can never be nerfed, like Tracer and Genji
- Battlepass and rewards are horrible
-PVE that was promised was scrapped for low effort missions.

All in all, game is still fun if you play it like 2 hours a week max. Dont take it too seriously, avoid competitive and you will be ait.
I give it a 6/10
